title: Draw Poker
description: Play Draw Poker and try to form the best hand possible!
objectiveText: The objective of Draw Poker is to form the best poker hand.
rule1: Click on the cards in your hand to select or deselect them.
rule2: button to discard the selected cards and draw new ones.
rule3: Your final hand will be evaluated, and its ranking in poker will be determined.
rule4: The better the hand, the more points you score!
cardRankingsText: The rankings of poker hands are: Royal Flush, Straight Flush, Four of a Kind, Full House, Flush, Straight, Three of a Kind, Two Pair, One Pair, High Card.
noteText: In Draw Poker, there are no wild cards or jokers.
handEvaluationFailed: Failed to evaluate the hand. Please try again.
highCardMessage: You have a high card. Aim for a better hand next time!
drawCardsMessage: You drew new cards. Please check your hand.
resetGameMessage: The game has been reset. Please draw cards again to start the game.
